MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH52 postcode area of Broxburn, affecting properties in Craigbank and surrounding areas. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 3:30pm due to a fault on our overhead line network near Craigbank farm and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.05pm on Sunday, 18 October 20200
